mapper.update: update ecs_goods_gallery set goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img_url = #{img_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_desc = #{img_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb_url = #{thumb_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_original = #{img_original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_attr_id = #{goods_attr_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_attr_image = #{is_attr_image,jdbcType=BIT}, img_sort = #{img_sort,jdbcType=TINYINT} where img_id = #{img_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select img_id, goods_id, img_url, img_desc, thumb_url, img_original, goods_attr_id, is_attr_image, img_sort from ecs_goods_gallery where img_id = #{img_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
